faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Simply sign up for a free account and follow the onboarding tutorial

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day free trial with full access to all features

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time without penalty
